channel.title: Translatation
channel.description:
Can anyone translate this into english please?
installera Battlefield 2142
1. mounta rzr-2142 med PowerISO eller liknande
2. installera spelet. Keygenerator finns i den mountade filen i en mapp.
3. efter att du installerat spelet så återstår 2 saker 1.lägg in crackfilen i C:\program\electronic arts\battlefield 2142
2. du måste lägga in default profile. för att göra detta måste du: öppna upp filen som finns i Crack på den mountade filen lägg in de 2 mapparna och de 2 filerna i Mina Dokument\Battlefield 2142
När du startar spelet så ska du först bara trycka på logga in,du kan INTE ändra inloggningsuppgifterna, tryck sedan på logga in. när felmeddelanden dyker upp, tryck bara avbryt och sedan väljer du profilen som finns där.
Thanks in advance

item.title: Translatation
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Scar_Auto Mr Scar Auto
item.description:
@Mr_Scar_Auto wrote:

Ok, so i’ve done this so far (all this hassle for a game lmao)

Ran Daemon tools and mounted the ISO onto the virtual dvd rom, and i’ve put in the keygened code and installing now. So afterwards (guessing from the translations) i’ll have to extract a file in the folder called “default profile”. Any idea for afterwards?

Thanks for your help so far, very helpful.[br][size=1]Posted on: February 25, 2007, 09:48:56 AM[/size][hr]The situation is odd, i’ll explain.

There are 4 files in the place where I extracted the torrent. These are “install readme” (the swedish one), a multikeygen, RZR-2142.iso file and a RZR - 2142 folder with contains 3.27gb of stuff. I have installed bf2141 and used the keygen to work the program. So what now? It says this when I load it “Please insert the battlefield 2142 install disk and press ok to retry”. So I put the ISO file onto a dvd disk and it still doesn’t work.

Can you help?

Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Translatation
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Scar_Auto Mr Scar Auto
item.description:
@Mr_Scar_Auto wrote:

Thanks a lot cripz and frank,

. you must lodge default profile. in order to do this must you:
open up the file that exists in Crack on the mountade the file
lodges the 2 files and the 2 files in my documents \ Battlefield 2142

When you start the playing so will you first only press to log on, you can not to change inloggningsuppgifterna,
pressures since on log on. when error messages turn up, prints only aborts
and since chooses you the profile that exists there

Can someone make this a bit clearer? I know its english but its a bit odd.

Thanks a lot!

Read full topic

item.title: Translatation
item.dc:creator: @CRIPZ_Chick CRIPZ Chick
item.description:
@CRIPZ_Chick wrote:

Thanks frank_.

I GOT the translation!!!

installs Battlefield 2142

  1. mounta rzr-2142 with PowerISO or similar

  2. installs the playing. Keygenerator exists in the mountade the file in a file.

  3. after that you the installed playing so remains 2 things
    1.lägg in crackfilen in C:\program\electronic art \ battlefield 2142

    1. you must lodge default profile. in order to do this must you:
      open up the file that exists in Crack on the mountade the file
      lodges the 2 files and the 2 files in my documents \ Battlefield 2142

When you start the playing so will you first only press to log on, you can not to change inloggningsuppgifterna,
pressures since on log on. when error messages turn up, prints only aborts
and since chooses you the profile that exists there

see

Read full topic

item.title: Translatation
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

i have no idea what it really says, but ill give you my interpretation of it

mount the image in PowerISO (i rkn daemon tool is better)
run the keygen on the cd
install the game
copy the crack into that directory
aaaaaand it looks as though you copy a game-profile crack or soemthing into the my documents/bf2142 folder

item.title: Translatation
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Scar_Auto Mr Scar Auto
item.description:
@Mr_Scar_Auto wrote:

Can anyone translate this into english please?

installera Battlefield 2142

  1. mounta rzr-2142 med PowerISO eller liknande

  2. installera spelet. Keygenerator finns i den mountade filen i en mapp.

  3. efter att du installerat spelet så återstår 2 saker
    1.lägg in crackfilen i C:\program\electronic arts\battlefield 2142

    1. du måste lägga in default profile. för att göra detta måste du:
      öppna upp filen som finns i Crack på den mountade filen
      lägg in de 2 mapparna och de 2 filerna i Mina Dokument\Battlefield 2142

När du startar spelet så ska du först bara trycka på logga in,du kan INTE ändra inloggningsuppgifterna,
tryck sedan på logga in. när felmeddelanden dyker upp, tryck bara avbryt
och sedan väljer du profilen som finns där.

Thanks in advance
